faqs.q: How many calories in 2 tbsp blue cheese dressing?
Is blue cheese dressing high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 15 g total fat per 2 tbsp, with 2.5 g saturated.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in blue cheese dressing?
faqs.a: Around 300 mg per 2 tbsp, so watch portions if sodium-sensitive.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in blue cheese dressing?
faqs.a: Low carbs at 2.5 g per serving, mostly from sugars.

faqs.q: How to make blue cheese dressing lower calorie?
faqs.a: Use low-fat mayo, Greek yogurt, or buttermilk to cut calories by 40-60 per serving.
